sawas wana wita wada awasan kara shehan bangalawata yama sadaha pitath wiya.magadi dara gena yana kanthawan nisa maga tikak asirunu athara ohu karayen basa ema kanthawanta bana waduneya."yako thopita me welawema methanin yanna oona unada.paren ayin weniyawu".ese banimin karayata nagunu ohu pare paththakata wi siti kanthawan desa rawa balamin karaya padawiya.namuth ek warama ohu muhunak dutu athara karaya nawathwa kannadiyen aya desa bala sitiyeya.sabawinma aya ruwathiya.dutu kenek aya desa thawath warak hari nobaluwanam eya pudumayaki.madakata kalin sidu wu deya nisa aa madak thathigena sitiyaya.ohu mada welawak bala sita semen karaya idiriyata padawiya.bangalawata pamina thama kamarayata giya ohu aa ganama kalpana karamin siti athara "mahaththayo bag eka methanin thiyannada".ee chuttage katahadayi.ohu bangalawe murakaru wana athara awurudu 56ka pamana wiya.itha napuru pudgalayeku wu ohu shehanta madak hithawath wiya.waththe siyalu denama ohuta biya wu athara nithara ohu atha thibu thuwakkuwa nisa eya deguna theguna wiya.
